name: Employer Elasticsearch Cluster is Unhealthy
query: max(last_10m):avg:elasticsearch.cluster_status{es-cluster-name:production-employers OR es-cluster-name:uk-production-employers OR es-cluster-name:production-employers-data OR es-cluster-name:uk-production-employers-data OR es-cluster-name:production-marketplace-interactions OR es-cluster-name:uk-production-marketplace-interactions OR es-cluster-name:backup-employers-production} by {es-cluster-name} < 2
